title: ClientCenter
description: This schema defines the ClientCenter entity. A ClientCenter is collection of hierarchical ClientCenterClients.

id.description: Unique identifier of a knowledge center instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this knowledge center.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

reviewers.description: User references of the reviewers for this knowledge center.

usageCount.description: Count of how many times clients from this knowledge center are used.

clientCount.description: Total number of clients in the knowledge center. This includes all the children in the hierarchy.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

disabled.description: System knowledge center can't be deleted. Use this flag to disable them.

mutuallyExclusive.description: ClientCenter clients that are direct children in this knowledge center are mutually exclusive. When mutually exclusive is `true` only one client can be used to label an entity. When mutually exclusive is `false`, multiple clients from this group can be used to label an entity.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.
